TabAbout.textMe1: I am a web developer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in areas such as digital marketing and e-commerce. Throughout my career, I have collaborated with various organizations, focusing on the creation and maintenance of high-level websites, as well as the design and development of landing pages and custom web solutions.
TabAbout.textMe2: My technical skills include solid expertise in front-end technologies such as HTML (Jade-Pug), CSS (SASS/SCSS/Less), and JavaScript (Webpack, Gulp, Vue). In addition, I have basic knowledge in back-end development, mainly in PHP (Laravel), and an intermediate level of experience in WordPress. Regarding CMS platforms, I am an expert in HubSpot, working with it since 2015 to the present, and I also have extensive knowledge of Shopify.
TabAbout.textMe3: My experience is complemented by a set of design skills, using tools such as Photoshop, Adobe XD, Figma, and Sketch.
